Articles.Content:
i am playing on windows 1.4.4 with making history. When i go to launch a vessel, the game crashes, here are the logs. how can i fix this?

https://www.dropbox.com/s/0ukn4b8qc6rczjn/KSP.log?dl=0

Do you have a crash log as well? The output_log just ends without any error message.
Also, any reason why you are running the 32bit version of KSP on a 64bit OS and 8GB RAM?

edit: just did a quick test and I'm running out of memory when I try to run the 32bit version...so maybe you just have to switch to 64bit

Edited June 29, 2018 by 4x4cheesecake

2 hours ago, 4x4cheesecake said:

Do you have a crash log as well? The output_log just ends without any error message.
Also, any reason why you are running the 32bit version of KSP on a 64bit OS and 8GB RAM?

edit: just did a quick test and I'm running out of memory when I try to run the 32bit version...so maybe you just have to switch to 64bit

didnt generate a crash log for whatever reason, though going to X64 appears to have worked
